Name: Sentinel Hub WMS
Title: Snow Depth
Description: Snow depth, in cm, represents the total height of the snowpack, i.e., the vertical distance between the terrain and the snow surface ([Fierz et al., 2009](https://unesdoc.unesco.org/ark:/48223/pf0000186462)). Generated daily based on the distributed full energy balance physical model GEOtop ([Endrizzi et al., 2014](https://gmd.copernicus.org/articles/7/2831/2014/gmd-7-2831-2014.html)).
